nodes.text: The Z'gag was a river on the planet Ruuria, near which the K'zagg Colony of Ruurians made their home. Known for its warm, pink waters, the Z'gag was the place where Ruurians of the K'zagg Colony spun their chrysalis once they reached the end of their larval stage and later emerge as chroma-wings, soaring in the skies above and focusing exclusively on mating. The Z'gag held a great romantic appeal to the natives of the colony, and its waters were immortalized in a song called "By the Banks of the Warm, Pink Z'gag."
The Z'gag was first mentioned in Han Solo and the Lost Legacy, a novel written by Brian Daley and released in 1980.
